item.title: UN Security Council to vote on Trump peace plan for Gaza
item.description: The US draft authorises decommissioning Hamas weapons - though the group has not said it will disarm.

item.title: 'He'd have lit up like a Christmas tree' - McGrath on scans, Bazball & Australia
item.description: Ex-Australia fast bowler Glenn McGrath questions if backroom staff have too much influence when they send bowlers for routine scans.

item.title: Delhi's alleged car bomb attacker named by investigators
item.description: The BBC spoke to the family of the man police allege was driving the car that exploded near Red Fort.

item.title: Cold snap brings chance of snow for some as flood clear-up continues
item.description: Storm Claudia moved away on Sunday after delivering over a month's worth of rain to parts of England and Wales.

item.title: Parents arrested after complaining about school on WhatsApp say police have paid Â£20k
item.description: A couple unlawfully arrested over complaints about their child's school say police have paid them damages.
